newsitem.title: USA: Red Lion forms panel on tax-status change.
newsitem.headline: Red Lion forms panel on tax-status change.

text.p: Red Lion Inns LP said Thursday it formed a special committee of independent directors to evaluate alternatives with the scheduled 1998 change in its tax status from a partnership to a corporation.
The alternatives include, among others, incorporating the partnership or converting or merging the partnership into a real estate investment trust.
Red Lion expects to have a recommendation from the special committee by late summer and to conclude any proposed action prior to year end.
Red Lion Inns LP owns 10 Red Lion hotels which are managed by Doubletree Corp.
